events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me, and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The customer's message includes a refund request and a return inquiry, appropriate for Refund cluster.
Assigning the refund case to the returns support specialist team for proper handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged?
The order number is 458723 and the jacket is brand new, it has never been worn or damaged.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund as soon as you ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will send.
That sounds great, thank you for your help! I will wait for the return label to arrive via email.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Hello again! We’re checking in to see if you were able to return the jacket and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday and I’m waiting for the refund confirmation. Thanks for following up!
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We’ve sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
